title: Comfiest Bed award
text:
We stayed at The Ludlow NYC over New Years 17.
The hotel was everything and more we expected. Situated in the Lower East Side of Manhattan the hotel is at the heart of an amazing neighbourhood with independent restaurants and bars.
We didn't eat at the hotel but the food looked good. The staff were friendly and the rooms were just what you need.
Small well decorated rooms with Nespresso machines, a well stocked mini bar and a 50" TV with cable (perfect for watching the news/sports when getting ready).
The rooms were clean, and the bed was honestly one of the comfiest i have slept in.
Look forward to staying here again.
Room Tip: Ironing facilites and umbrella in the closet - Life savours if packing lite. See more room tips
